column2:
"Oh, what a lifesaver!
This wax
was nearly unobtainable!"
"Why do we use such a valuable item? That's because this grand, major party is expected to be once in a lifetime!"

"We can't be stingy at such a time!
Even for the candles, we've got
to prepare the best items we can!"
"At any rate, thanks! This is the reward for this request! If something else comes up, I'm counting on you!"
